The Aesthetics Beauté

Moroccanoil

My experience with this oil is amazing!

I have a lot of bad day hair, since frizz and lack of structure. So, when I am at this days, I use the oil and feel a huge improvement in texture and visual.

I tried other oils, but until now, for me this is the best one.

If I use everyday, it last about 4 months on the mini size.
